data.Title: Google Search and Algorithm Updates
data.Description: Google has been experiencing intense ranking volatility, potentially indicating upcoming algorithm changes. The company also released its August 2024 webmaster report, covering topics like deepfake search updates, autocomplete predictions, and indexing bugs.  There are also rumors of a potential Google core update in the near future.

data.Title: Bing Search Algorithm Update
data.Description: Glenn Gabe suggests that Bing may have launched a significant search algorithm core update around May 29th, based on observed search ranking volatility.

data.Title: Google Ads Outage
data.Description: Barry Schwartz reports an ongoing Google Ads outage, providing updates and directing users to Search Engine Roundtable for more information.

data.Title: Google to Pay Licensing Fees to Chatbot Maker
data.Description: Glenn Gabe highlights news about Google agreeing to pay licensing fees to a chatbot maker, suggesting potential developments in AI and search integration.

data.Title: New York Times Blocks OpenAI's SearchGPT Web Crawler
data.Description: Business Insider reports that The New York Times and other major news outlets have blocked OpenAI's SearchGPT web crawler from accessing their content, raising concerns about copyright and data usage.

data.Title: ChatGPT Cites Plagiarized New York Times Articles
data.Description: Glenn Gabe discusses a report about ChatGPT citing plagiarized New York Times articles from a content mill, raising concerns about the accuracy and ethical implications of AI-generated content.

data.Title: Google Trends SEO Insights
data.Description: Search Engine Journal shares five SEO insights from Google, focusing on how to leverage Google Trends data for website optimization and traffic analysis.

data.Title: Hreflang and International SEO
data.Description: Glenn Gabe recommends a Google Search Off The Record podcast episode that covers hreflang implementation for international SEO, including topics like LDCP, the "lang" attribute, and x-default.

data.Title: Local SEO Mishaps and Recovery
data.Description: Glenn Gabe shares a resource by Phil Rozek that outlines common and less-common Local SEO mistakes that can negatively impact local rankings, including insights on recovery time.
